comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
Potentially the wife of Andrew Hamilton gault:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5964394490/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I think this is probably his first wife, Marguerite Claire Clark Stephens. Photo of Marguerite Stephens Gault in McCord Museum www.mccord-museum.qc.ca/en/collection/artifacts/MP-0000.2481 Could even be in the same dress/blouse. Although the photo has a jacket on top. So I think this picture is of Hamiton Gault's first wife.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Yes, I think that you're right, swanq. This is Marguerite Stephens Gault, Hamilton Gault's first wife.  We'll add this information to the record the next time we update.
